summary_md: Moldova, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 3,873 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 4.68% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 1.43% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 71.20 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 80.20% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is recorded at 31.41% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Moldova's economy is characterized by a GDP per capita of 3,873 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an export growth of 31.41% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market in Moldova shows an unemployment rate of 1.43% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating the proportion of the workforce that is jobless.
sections.digital_md: Internet penetration in Moldova is at 80.20% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), reflecting the level of digital connectivity among its population.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Moldova is 71.20 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), suggesting the general health and living conditions of its citizens.
